text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Probably because the media have more important issues to report on like all the U.S citizens dead or dying from the Covid-19 crisis you keeping ignoring as if it isn't happening or the millions unemployed 
Ratings only matter in your tiny little mind and not The real world
